title: How to Change an Icon in Windows 7

steps.title: Right click the folder you want to change.
steps.content: Right click the folder you want to change.

steps.title: Click on Properties at the bottom of the drop-down list.
steps.content: Click on Properties at the bottom of the drop-down list.

steps.title: Navigate through the list of Default Windows Icons.
steps.content: Navigate through the list of Default Windows Icons.

steps.title: If you want to use a custom icon, use an online image to ico converter.
steps.content: If you want to use a custom icon, use an online image to ico converter. Use the browse button to select the icon file and done!
